dbd_mermaid:
erDiagram
  USER {
    string id PK
    string email
    string password_hash
    datetime created_at
    datetime updated_at
  }
api_mermaid:
flowchart LR
  Client -->|POST /users| UsersAPI
  Client -->|GET /users| UsersAPI
  Client -->|GET /users/id| UsersAPI
  Client -->|PUT /users/id| UsersAPI
  Client -->|DELETE /users/id| UsersAPI
stories: As a user, I can create an account with email and password so I can log in.
As a user, I can fetch my profile data by id.
As an admin, I can list all users in the system.
As a user, I can update my profile information.
As an admin, I can delete a user account.
